src:
Duljaj se vraća u Partizan
Kao pomoćnik u stručnom štabu Sava Miloševića

01 Nov 2019

Nedostaje igrača za trku na dva fronta, ali bar će stručni štab Partizana biti jak kao crna zemlja. Sportski žurnal piše da će, nakon što je Albert Nađ preuzeo ulogu Teleoptikovog trenera, u stručni štab Sava Miloševića vrlo verovatno biti uključen još jedan legendarni igrač crno-belih Igor Duljaj!
Nije još sve dogovoreno, ali prema Žurnalovim informacijama vrlo je blizu, jer je Duljaj više nego zainteresovan da se posle 15 godina vrati u Srbiju. U Ukrajini je već ispekao i trenerski zanat, pošto je po završetku igračke karijere pomogao Paolu Fonseki, a zatim radio i sa mladim Šahtjorovim timom.
U međuvremenu je završio i PRO licencu, ima ime, autoritet, a još je tokom igračke karijere važio za veoma inteligentnog fudbalera na terenu. Savo Milošević je već napravio dobar posao u Humskoj – na stranu sad poneki prvenstveni kiks zbog tanke klupe – a još kad bi stigao i Duljaj... Imalo bi se šta naučiti.
Još samo da uprava obavi svoj deo posla i kad je teren u pitanju. Jer svima je jasno da crno-belima treba duža klupa.


Pogledajte novu epizodu serije Ekipizza...




(FOTO: Star Sport)
text:
Doulay returns to Partizan
As an assistant in the expert staff of Sava Milosevic

01 Nov 2019

There is a lack of players to race on two fronts, but at least Partizan's headquarters will be as strong as a black country. Sports magazine writes that after Albert Nagy took over as Teleoptik's coach, another legendary black and white player, Igor Dulaj, is likely to be included in the professional staff of Sava Milosevic!
Not everything has been agreed, but according to the Journal, it is very close, because Dulaj is more than interested in returning to Serbia after 15 years. He has already mastered the coaching profession in Ukraine, since after his playing career he helped Paolo Fonseka and then worked with a young Shakhtar team.
In the meantime, he completed his PRO license, has a name, authority, and during his playing career he was considered a very intelligent football player on the field. Savo Milosevic has already done a good job in Humska - aside now some championship kickoffs due to the thin bench - and even when Duljaj arrives ... There is something to be learned.
It is only for the administration to do its part in the field. Because it is clear to all that black and whites need a longer bench.


Check out the new episode of the Ekipizza series ...




(PHOTO: Star Sport)
